Package by.bsuir.oop.shytsikau.graphic.figures.basic

package by.bsuir.oop.shytsikau.graphic.figures.basic
The package contains figures that are basic and can also be used for building more complex figures. The classes implement coordinates calculation based on canonical equation of basic figures
